videographerText: At our event you have a possibility to order both photos and videos of your performances from one of the best Bellydance videographers and our photographers team with over 10 years of experience – Vladimir Kluchenkov. Videos and photos of your performances you can order at any time during the event at the reception, or later on his website <0>www.bestpicture.pro</0>
photoPack: all the pictures (approx. 7-10) of a single performance: 20€ / 100zł
offer: 20% discount if you buy at least 2 videos or 2 photo packages or 1 video and 1 photo package in a single order with the code CHAMPIONSHIP2024
